titleStmt.title: A collection out of the book called Liber regalis, remaining in the treasury of the church of Westminster. Touching the coronation of the King and Queen together, according to the usual form.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.D. for Charls Adams, at the Talbot in Fleetstreet, over against Fetter-Lane.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 5", "1660 Feb 5"; the second 1 in imprint date changed to "0".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Talbot in Fleetstreet, over against Fetter-Lane.
